org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.oauth2.resource.servlet

Class OAuth2ResourceServerAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.oauth2.resource.servlet.OAuth2ResourceServerAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @AutoConfigureBefore(value=SecurityAutoConfiguration.class)
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=OAuth2ResourceServerProperties.class)
 @ConditionalOnClass(value={org.springframework.security.oauth2.server.resource.authentication.JwtAuthenticationToken.class,org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.JwtDecoder.class})
 @ConditionalOnWebApplication(type=SERVLET)
 @Import(value={org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.oauth2.resource.servlet.OAuth2ResourceServerJwtConfiguration.class,org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.oauth2.resource.servlet.OAuth2ResourceServerWebSecurityConfiguration.class})

extends Object
    Auto-configuration for OAuth resource server support.
